moves.name: Hip throw
moves.note: From T-position, step foot between, swivel hips and then go farther out to get hips in.

moves.name: Two-hand front choke defense (Bend at Hips)
moves.note: Flex your neck; down and around the hands

moves.name: Two-Handed Lapel Grab Defense (with hip throw)
moves.note: high grab to head and arm hip throw

moves.name: Two-hand front choke defense (with arm lock)
moves.note: When grabbed by the neck, heart grip around wrist. Establish base and lean forward to secure the hand, twising it out to create tension. Step forward and under the arm and then behind the attacker. Finish in an arm lock.

moves.name: Two-hand front choke defense (against a wall)
moves.note: Reach behind and grab a wrist with on hand and at least one finger with the other. When you get one, grab the wrist with your free hand and pin against chest. Lean forward for the break.

moves.name: Single Hand Front Choke Defense (against wall)
moves.note: strike wrist, turn, elbow to head

moves.name: Wall-pin defense
moves.note: When attacker has both collars, shuffle-step sideways toward attacker's forward let, parallel to the wall and slam attacker against the wall. Follow with a knee strike.

moves.name: Single-Hand Lapel Grab Defense (bent elbow)
moves.note: low grab, step under to chicken wing

moves.name: Single-hand collar grab defense (wrist fold)
moves.note: When they grab the collar, slap the wrist to fold it while grabbing the elbow into a wrist lock. Turn sideways to finish the lock.

moves.name: Single-Hand Lapel Grab Defense (palm turned up)
moves.note: high lapel grab, wrist lock with leg trip

moves.name: Single-hand collar grab defense (straight arm)
moves.note: When grabbed high in the collar, secure the wrist with thumbs up. With a firm grip, spin around with the attacker's forearm over your shoulder and lean forward for the straight arm. Raise your shoulder to prevent the attacker's arm from slipping out.

moves.name: Single-Hand Lapel Grab Defense (thumb down)
moves.note: with thumb facing down (straight arm) waki gatame

moves.name: Single-hand chest-push defense
moves.note: Grab the elbow and on the top of the wrist. Step in to wrist lock, close the distance to avoid punches.

moves.name: Double-collar grab defense (hands apart)
moves.note: Swim arms up through the middle and over the attacker's arms. Do a vicious hip throw or leg sweep and break the arm in the mean streets.

moves.name: Double-collar grab defense (hands together)
moves.note: Make a fist and block the attacker's wrist and grab your own wrist. Turn your body and viciously rip their grips off of you. Back elbow to the face.

moves.name: Shoulder grab defense (arm bent)
moves.note: When grabbed, throw your arm around theirs and shoulder lock them.

moves.name: Shoulder grab defense (straight arm)
moves.note: If the person straightens their arm, step in front of them and do a standing arm bar.

moves.name: Headlock Defense (with punch)
moves.note: grab wrist and elbow, hips in, go under arm to bent arm lock

moves.name: Headlock Defense (attacker upright)
moves.note: cup chin, look up, squat and lift leg

moves.name: Headlock defense (attacker bent over)
moves.note: Secure the arm so you are not punched. Step in front and grab the far leg. Step through the attacker's legs to sit down and roll the attacker over.

moves.name: Headlock defense (attacker with wide stance)
moves.note: There are two. The "nice" way is to control the punching side. Take your leg and block behind their far leg and sit down and transition to mount. The "meaner" way is to control the inside leg and sit through (attacker goes to their head).

moves.name: Headlock defense (pressure on the nose)
moves.note: From the headlock, reach up and over the attacker's head to the wall. Hook the leg and straighten your back to break the headlock.

moves.name: Headlock defense against a wall (attacker outside)
moves.note: Push in to the attacker and scoop the leg. Run the pipe away from the wall.

moves.name: Headlock defense against a wall (attacker inside)
moves.note: Push in to the attacker and scoop the leg. Run the pipe away from the wall.

moves.name: Guillotine Defense (sitting back)
moves.note: both hands on one knee and sit and bridge

moves.name: Guillotine defense (sliding down)
moves.note: Outside arm over shoulder, inside hand on knee. Hop and sit through so the attacker goes over you.

moves.name: Guillotine Defense (with trip takedown)
moves.note: arm over shoulder, weight down and buckle the knee

moves.name: Guillotine Choke
moves.note: wrist to shoulder, knee to mid-section to maintain distance, then pull into guard

moves.name: Guillotine choke (if taken down)
moves.note: Finish the guillotine. ðŸ˜‚

moves.name: Tackle defense (with elbow strike)
moves.note: Block both shoulders and then downward elbow strike to the spine.

moves.name: Tackle defense (with knee strike)
moves.note: Block both shoulders, knee to the face.

moves.name: Front bear hug over the arms
moves.note: Base, put arms up and transition into hip throw

moves.name: Front bear hug defense under the arms (with frame)
moves.note: frame face base back

moves.name: Front bear hug defense under the arms (with chin push)
moves.note: frame face drop back

moves.name: Sucker punch defense
moves.note: Roundhouse punch close and lunging punch and straight punch

moves.name: Haymaker punch defense
moves.note: Duck under the punch so the attacker goes over your back. Grab their ankles to assist them going over you.

moves.name: Front Kick Defense (to mid-section)
moves.note: Absorb, step back, catch, cup heel and lift

moves.name: Front kick defense (with pivot)
moves.note: When they kick, push the leg inside and step outside with a pivot.

moves.name: Front kick defense (High)
moves.note: Block with hand on hip and cover head, go to foot lock

moves.name: Roundhouse kick defense
moves.note: Step away from the kick and catch the leg (don't do the thing in the video--too many MMA watchers). Figure four the leg and toss the attacker down. Knee bar.

moves.name: Standing up in base
moves.note: Stand up---in base

moves.name: Hand chop
moves.note: Run your hands through your hair and then hand chop to the neck.

moves.name: Punch
moves.note: Punch them in the face

moves.name: Elbow strike
moves.note: Elbow strike to the face

moves.name: Side kick (surprise attack)
moves.note: Surprise the attacker and kick them in the knee. Forward let kicks their forward leg; 45Â° angle for the foot; contact in the middle of the foot.

moves.name: Side kick
moves.note: Same side kick, but use timing (bait by moving backwards).

moves.name: Rear Choke Defense
moves.note: walk backwards and throw over shoulder

moves.name: Rear Choke Defense Pulled Back (with side throw)
moves.note: elbow tight to chest, reap leg and bow

moves.name: Rear choke defense pulled back (with overhead throw)
moves.note: Address choke and make base. Move to the side and leg sweep.

moves.name: Rear two-hand choke defense
moves.note: Gator neck and reach back to get the wrist and lean to one side. Keep twisting the wrist to the ground.

moves.name: Rear Bear Hug Defense (over the arms)
moves.note: be sure to have hips engaged

moves.name: Rear bear hug over the arms defense (with wide stance)
moves.note: Make base and step behind the legs. Grab their legs and throw the attacker.

moves.name: Rear Bear Hug under arms defense
moves.note: hook outside leg with foot

moves.name: Rear Bear Hug under arms defense (with lift)
moves.note: hook outside leg with foot

moves.name: Full nelson defense
moves.note: Make base and pull your arms down. When the grips break, turn toward attacker.
